channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Mmm Simple File List
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Mmm Simple File List

item.title: CVE-2023-4297|2024-07-11T15:11:55.365Z -- unknown -- mmm%20simple%20file%20list
item.description: The Mmm Simple File List WordPress plugin through 2.3 does not validate the generated path to list files from, allowing any authenticated users, such as subscribers, to list the content of arbitrary directories.
